name: Lewd Island - Season 1
description:
After a plane crash you and your colleague find yourselves on an abandoned island.
Will help arrive? Were there other survivors? What will happen? You play and YOU decide!
Content:
- over 6400 images
- 186 animations
Gameplay:
- Dialogue choices
- Branching Story
Lewd island: Season 2, and future seasons, will be a continuation of the story and released and sold separately as DLC.
